entry.title: Russia to organize high-level talks with Armenia, Azerbaijan

media:group.media:title: Russia to organize high-level talks with Armenia, Azerbaijan
media:group.media:description:
üìçRussia‚Äôs Foreign Ministry said it is planning to organize high-level talks with Armenian and Azerbaijani officials by the end of the month. üìçIranian President Ebrahim Raisi reiterated that Iran will oppose any attempts to alter its borders in the Caucasus in a phone call with Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan. üìçArmenia‚Äôs Foreign Ministry denied news in the Turkish press saying that Armenia and Turkey‚Äôs special envoys for normalization talks will meet again next month. üìçThe Armenian government will allocate over $6.5 million to complete construction on three roads. üìçThe authorities in Karabakh said the situation along the line of contact remains ‚Äúrelatively stable,‚Äù despite ‚Äúcertain tensions.‚Äù

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Armenia delaying peace efforts, says Azerbaijani foreign minister

media:group.media:title: Armenia delaying peace efforts, says Azerbaijani foreign minister
media:group.media:description:
üìçKarabakh President Arayik Harutyunyan signed a de-mobilization decree, after declaring a partial mobilization earlier this month . üìçGeneral Vitaly Balasanyan, the secretary of Karabakh‚Äôs Security Council, visited the town of Berdzor, also known as Lachin, together with representatives of the Russian peacekeeping contingent and the Azerbaijani side. üìçIn an interview with Turkish media, Azerbaijani Foreign Minister Jeyhun Bayramov accused Armenia of delaying implementation of previously reached agreements, especially regarding the Zangezur corridor. #civilnet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #dailyarmenia

entry.title: Images appear online of Berdzor church converted into mosque

media:group.media:title: Images appear online of Berdzor church converted into mosque
media:group.media:description:
On August 25, the Lachin corridor, including the Armenian-populated communities of Aghavno, Berdzor (also known as Lachin), and Sus, will be handed over to Azerbaijan. CivilNet‚Äôs Karabakh team went to Aghavno and Berdzor after the evacuation order was announced to talk to residents. What do they think about leaving? What assistance are they receiving? And what do they want others to know about the decision that has led to them losing their homes?

entry.title: What challenges is Armenia‚Äôs healthcare system facing?

media:group.media:title: What challenges is Armenia‚Äôs healthcare system facing?
media:group.media:description:
Noubar Afeyan, co-founder of the ARMENIA 2041 Foundation, sat down with Anahit Avanesyan, Armenia‚Äôs health minister, to talk about her career working in the country‚Äôs healthcare system. Avanesyan also discussed the importance of public-private partnerships in the healthcare sector, how her ministry dealt with the fallout of the COVID-19 pandemic and the 2020 Karabakh war, and what challenges Armenia‚Äôs healthcare system is facing today.

üìçThe presence of Russian border guards and posts along the Armenian side of the Armenia-Iran border has increased. üìçArmenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan held a telephone conversation with Russian President Vladimir Putin. üìçArmenia‚Äôs men's chess team won silver at the 44th World Chess Olympiad.
